channel.title: Ally drop rates
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ally drop rates" - What affects them?

item.title: Re: Ally drop rates
item.content:encoded:
Doing AA-Ranks doesn't affect ally drop rates. Nor does doing general missions. Doing them at a higher crank may have something to do with it, but even that's not confirmed.

Emo's drop rates were supposed to be significantly increased lately.

item.title: Re: Ally drop rates
item.content:encoded:
I don't know if this is correct but while doing AA - Rank missions for a week with Emo3, Billy3 and Annon2 I got daily over thirty drops. Almost all missions gave me Razors, CDs, Pictures, Buckets and Smokebombs.

Theme I'm using is Stand By Your Ninja but this effect only come with AA Rank missions.

Also I don't know if this is important but I'm doing it by General mission. (It's for ryo ~ 30k daily)

All this suggests that AA has higher drop rate.

Could some other Sannin check this?

item.title: Re: Ally drop rates
item.content:encoded: Run missions with Right, Hyuk, and The Paper using 'I need this' jutsu and the juice bar if you can.

item.title: Re: Ally drop rates
item.content:encoded: guess that just leaves wasteland :) I'm Season 1 and only trade lvl 1, trying to beat wasteland befor I loop

item.title: Re: Ally drop rates
item.content:encoded: Either run wasteland missions for the drops, or grab LisaLisa and Right with Olmek and go to town. Use I Need This, the Theme, and perhaps Juice.

item.title: Re: Ally drop rates
item.content:encoded:
Ok so whats the best way to get note pages?
I need 8 more for The Paper.

item.title: Re: Ally drop rates
item.content:encoded: Also, I Need This doesn't affect Mission drop rates, only ally.

item.title: Re: Ally drop rates
item.content:encoded:
Not quite, you're forgetting the original drop rate.

If the original drop rate is 10%, Juice in your example would make it 13%. I Need This would double it to 26%.

Ramen doesn't affect allies dropping stuff.

item.title: Re: Ally drop rates
item.content:encoded:
Hey just checking this should work like so right?

3 Chaser (2400 Ryo) +10% Ally Drop Chance! = 30% chance plus
Ichi Special doubles to 60% chance then add
I Need This doubles again 120% chance

it should stack like so yes?

item.title: Re: Ally drop rates
item.content:encoded:
all is luk
i get five billy bucket today with all my stamina

item.title: Re: Ally drop rates
item.content:encoded: One jutsu does that I know of. The Agony of Defeat, taught by Right lvl 2. If you look on the Jutsu list here, it's right at the top…big cost, but for those items especially, it's worth it.

item.title: Ally drop rates
item.content:encoded: I'm looking to level Emosuke to level 3, so I'll need some razor blades and a billy bucket … but I was wondering what affects the rates? Any jutsu, any allies besides the HoClaus (Christmas being NOWHERE near), possibly number of allies, hanging out?
